channel.title: bug within opening train sequence
channel.description:
So I have just installed Black Mesa, tried to play it through steam, and cannot get further than about 30 seconds into the train sequence!
I can start the train sequence fine, it runs for about 30 seconds, the automated voice tells me about the topside temperature and that the facility is kept at 62 degrees or whatever, then as soon as the train rounds the next corner I get a loading screen and it teleports me to the middle of an outdoor valley with plants and cacti in the sky and what looks like the underground facility floating just off the end of the valley to the right. I cannot move around or do anything exept open and close the menu. I have tried restarting steam several times, and made sure I had the Source SDK base downloaded but I cannot get past the train no matter how I try!

item.title: bug within opening train sequence
item.dc:creator: philman132
item.description:
elivance:

You must be careful when you use noclip.

I’d do in this way:

1-input “sv_cheats 1” and “noclip” (will appear on the console something like noclip is ON).
2-with slight touches of W move Gordon above the catwalk:
this is important because if the distance between Gordon and the floor is too narrow the ragdoll can get stuck.
3-When you’ve place your character 1 mt above the catwalk open the console and input “noclip” again(you’ll have as output noclip is now OFF).
4- input “sv_cheats 0”

I’d try to do it before Barney starts to talk or after.

Yeah thanks but I don’t think you read my problem, I know how to use noclip. The game crashes before I even reach the section with Barney. The first train section works, it gets to the first loading screen just after the voiceover lady mentions the temperature is 68 degrees or whatever and then after the loading (loading screens are normal I know) I get teleported way above the level and unable to move, even when using noclip.

TehBoxNoob-

Thanks, I have tried from several different servers, but if it is corrupt files then I guess there is not much else I can do but keep trying to re-download and install I guess. Is there any way to check the files are corrupt other than trying to play and getting crash at the same place again?

tried re-installing, deleteing, restarting, reinstalling again. Tried the torrent version of the file over the other download versions. Still getting the exact same problem!

item.title: bug within opening train sequence
item.dc:creator: MadDoctor
item.description:
Try going into the developer console and noclipping back to your tram. If you don’t know how, just go into “options”, then keyboard, then advanced, and check enable developer console. Then, press the “~” key to open the console if you are using an American keyboard. If you are using a European one, or something like a Dvorak keyboard, then it should be the key under Esc, but it may not be “~”. Anyways, type in “sv_cheats 1” without the quotes then type in “noclip” without the quotes. Close the console. The noclip disables gravity and collision so you could possibly move back to your tram. Just move around until you find your tram, get inside, and type in noclip in the console again, and continue with your game. If you can’t understand what I just typed, I’m sorry, and send me a PM if you need further help.
